Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problem at Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problem at Cermak.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
